name: slider
docstring: Provides user selection from a range of values.

properties.name: as_child
properties.docstring: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.docstring: Whether to render the button with higher contrast color against background

properties.name: default_value
properties.docstring: The value of the slider when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the slider.

properties.name: value
properties.docstring: The controlled value of the slider. Must be used in conjunction with onValueChange.

properties.name: name
properties.docstring: The name of the slider. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

properties.name: min
properties.docstring: The minimum value of the slider.

properties.name: max
properties.docstring: The maximum value of the slider.

properties.name: step
properties.docstring: The step value of the slider.

events.name: on_change
events.docstring: Fired when the value of the slider changes.

events.name: on_value_commit
events.docstring: Fired when a thumb is released after being dragged.
